meeting_info.organization: Government Performance and Financial Management Committee
meeting_info.location: Council Chambers, 6th Floor, City Hall, Dallas, Texas; Virtual via video conference

presenters: Clifford Sparks, State Legislative Director, City Attorney’s Office
Nikki Christmas, Director, Mayor and City Council Office
Tammy L. Palomino, City Attorney, City Attorney’s Office
Janette Weedon, Director, Budget & Management Services
Elizabeth Saab, Chief of Strategy, Engagement, and Alignment, City Manager’s Office
